events.name: How The Satanic Temple is Changing the Way We Talk about Religion
events.description: Author Joseph Laycock gives us a short summary on his book with a follow-up live Q&A.

events.name: Live from Salem: Songs of Heresy and Blasphemy
Satanic Symbolism
events.description: Where do the symbols of Satanism come from and what exactly do they mean? With Thomas Vallor.

events.name: Ramen Making!
events.description: Another Case of the Mondaze: Come home and relax and take this class on ramen making-- with Satanic Chef.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Satanic Archives
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: Infernal Goat Nursery
events.description: Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: Sacred Tension
events.description: Blogger and Sacred Tension Podcast host Stephen B. Long presents his work with a follow-up live Q&A.

events.name: The Happy Satanist
events.description: Pre-recorded lecture by Lilith Starr, NO Q&A.

events.name: Finding Empowerment: Tenets, Sigils, Rituals
events.description: Author and blogger Aria deSatanas presents her handbook and blog with a follow-up live Q&A.
